import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useCart, useCartUpdate, useCartOpen} from '../../Contexts/CartContext' function ProductCard(props) { const products = useCart() const AddProduct = useCartUpdate().AddProduct const setOpen = useCartOpen().setOpen return (

{products[0].name}

{products[0].color}

{products[0].price}

) } export default ProductCard
